summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2003 HARLEY DAVIDSON RIDLEY AUTO GLIDE MOTORCYCLE.  WHILE DRIVING APPROXIMATELY 40 MPH THE FRAME COLLAPSED. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE VEHICLE CRASHED INTO THE PAVEMENT WHICH CAUSED THE FRAME TO SPLIT IN HALF. THE CONTACT WAS ABLE TO CONTINUE DRIVING ONTO THE EMERGENCY LANE USING THE UNDER CARRIAGE AND BACK WHEEL. THE CONTACT INJURED HIS BACK AND HIS NECK.  A POLICE REPORT WAS FILED. THE VEHICLE WAS TOWED TO HIS RESIDENCE. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED OR INSPECTED BY A MECHANIC. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE AND CURRENT MILEAGES WERE 11,000.
